name: SimplyTech real-time web development
body:
### Welcome to SimplyTech!

* Do you need to develop a custom Shopify App or Theme?
* Do you need to enable your website or webapp with real-time communication?
* Do you want to talk with your clients in real-time using only your browser and their browser?
* Do you want to have a video conference with them as they visit your website?
* Do you want to develop a real-time multi-player game that will work in the browser on any device?

**SimplyTech is here to help!**

We are passionate about:
* Shopify Apps
* Shopify Themes
* Ruby on Rails
* HTML5 / CSS3
* Real-time communication in the browser
* Server-side Javascript using Node.js
* Client-side Javascript

### Contact
Drop us an email today: info (at) simplytech (dot) com

---

### Repositories
* [Whiches][1]

Ruby gem to find executables in all the paths in $PATH.

* [rails3-unr][2]

Based on the book "Ruby on Rails - Up and Running" (by Bruce A. Tate & Curt Hibbs), this tool automates the process of following the book so that you don't have to type any commands or edit any files, but also modifies all examples to work with Rails 3.  All you need to do is specify the page number where you're reading and the tool will issue all commands and edit all files to bring the state of your system to an equivalent state at that page.

---
![Shopify - Create your own online store](http://wiki.shopify.com/upload/1/1b/Shopify-buttons-468x60.jpg "Shopify")




[1]: https://github.com/simplytech/whiches     "Whiches"
[2]: https://github.com/simplytech/rails3-unr  "rails3-unr"
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
